description: The Fire Cooking T-Shirt is made from a premium 100 % organic cotton jersey and offers a soft and comfortable feel. The front of this t-shirt features a stunning illustration created by the talented Alana Louise. Designed in a regular fit, it provides a relaxed and flattering look that is true to size. You can feel confident in its sustainable and high-quality construction thanks to the GOTS and Oeko-Tex® standard 100 certifications.
name: Hooke Fire Cooking T-Shirt - Mens
